subtitle: Anzeigen-Vermittelung und Vertretung für sämtliche Zeitungen und Zeitschriften Deutschlands und des Auslandes.
title: ALA Allgemeine Anzeigen Gesellschaft m.b.H., Auslands-Anzeigen G.m.b.H.
subjects: Ala Allgemeine Anzeigen Gesellschaft m.b.H. -- Directories

description.value: Pamphlet introduces the aims of the German advertising society to promote German newspaper and periodical advertising in Germany and abroad. Includes list of German companies involved in the society.

notes.value: In: Illustrated advertising cards, booklets, samples, etc., collected at the Leipzig "Messe" expositions from 1917 to 1925, box 1.
